root.title: n.z trade bank deposit growth rise slightli
root.body: new zealand trade bank season adjust deposit growth rise 2.6 pct januari compar rise 9.4 pct decemb reserv bank say year-on-year total deposit rise 30.6 pct compar 26.3 pct increas decemb year 34.5 pct rise year ago period say weekli statist releas total deposit rise 17.18 billion n.z dlr januari compar 16.74 billion decemb 13.16 billion januari 1986
